abstract: Bank of America is working under a secret regulatory sanction requiring it to overhaul its board and address risk and liquidity problems, The Wall Street Journal said. The Financial Times said Citigroup was close to similar arrangements.
snippet: Bank of America is working under a secret regulatory sanction requiring it to overhaul its board and address risk and liquidity problems, The Wall Street Journal said. The Financial Times said Citigroup was close to similar arrangements.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America is operating under a secret regulatory sanction that requires it to overhaul its board and address perceived problems with risk and liquidity management, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the situation.

headline.main: Secret Sanctions for BofA and Citi?
